mapper.sql: id, code, nick_name, avatar_url, gender, phone, wechat, union_id, info, country, province, city, town, create_date, modify_date
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, code, nick_name, avatar_url, gender, phone, wechat, union_id, info, country, province, city, town, create_date, modify_date ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{town,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update user
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
avatar_url = #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
union_id = #{unionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
town = #{town,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar_url = #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, union_id = #{unionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, town = #{town,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT u.id,u.avatar_url,u.nick_name,c.id c_id,c.content,c.address,c.create_date FROM user as u,content as c WHERE u.id=c.user_id AND u.id=#{id}
